title: Getting Started
excerpt: Welcome to my thoughts and musings! This is where I share my experiences with games, books, projects, and life.
content: This is my personal space where I document my journey through gaming, reading, development, and life. I'll be sharing reviews, thoughts, screenshots, and whatever inspires me. Looking forward to sharing this with you!

title: Starting content creation...again
excerpt: taking breaks is imporatnt but so is spreading what you know and helping others
content: I spent so long hesitating to start content creation again after a long break. But I've realized that taking breaks is important, but so is spreading what you know and helping others. So here I am, ready to share my journey and insights with the world! It's why I started instagram again. But this time a blend of my life and also lessons I've learned as I go through life. From code, to AI and other things in the rapid changing world.
